==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|扌|戈|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc}}.

Originally a variant form of {{zh-l|*划}}. Borrowed to mean a similar action.

The popular interpretation as a hand ({{zh-l|*扌}}) looking for an halberd ({{zh-l|*戈}}) is a [[mnemonic]] and not the etymology of the character.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[look for]]; to [[seek]]
#* {{zh-x|他 決定 出去 找 食物。|He decided to go out to '''search''' for food.}}
#* {{zh-x|你 找 沒 找 沙發 后面？|Have you '''looked''' behind the sofa?}}
# to [[ask for]] somebody; to [[call on]] somebody
#* {{zh-x|有 人 來 找 我 沒有？|Did anybody '''ask''' for me ?}}
# to [[give]] [[change]]
#: {{zh-x|不 用 找 了。|Keep the change.}}
#* {{zh-x|這 是 找 你 的 錢。|Here is your change.}}
